channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Several inches of mud and tree debris in gutters Kensington Ave, 11th February
item.description:
The mid section of the avenue, from no 13 down to the junction with queens road. Several inches of muck, tree debris, mud are built up in the gutters. Causing the already bad flooding situation to be even worse. Street cleaning hasn’t been carried out in over a year. Please can you clean?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Kensington Avenue, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees on hyden road over grown into our property and damaging it, 10th February
item.description:
Its on hyden road cheltenham our property is 15 patterdale close

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Just look at all the reports here..., 10th February
item.description:
Pathetic piece of road, may as well not have any tarmac there anymore. Council just marks them as fixed, yet the road is in appalling condition. Horrible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Douro Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Surprise surprise, your patch-job failed, 10th February
item.description:
This bit of road had multiple holes in it last year. They were 'filled' in with what I can only imagine was the lowest quality materials. And now 3 huge holes have re-appeared. Let's see how long until the council takes action, if ever
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, William Gough Close, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Diagraceful council marking these 'Fixed', 10th February
item.description:
You are fully aware of how atrocious this bit of road is, yet you do nothing about it. You just mark our reports as 'resolved' which is absurd. Stick a dash cam on your cars and drive down that road at 30mph and see what happens... disgusting from you lot.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 172, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rattling cover disturbing residents, 10th February
item.description:
What three words Slim.smooth.elite Previous repair insufficient. Please try again as it still rattles every time a car it's it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 329, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead rat hidden in vegetation debris, 10th February
item.description:
Pavement is covered with dead animals and decaying vegetation. Danger to health.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poorly finished resurfacing, 10th February
item.description:
School lane was resurfaced 3 months ago and this is how the area by the drain next to the entrance to Orchard View now looks as the area was not resurfaced up to the drain platform. I'm concerned that the tarmac in place will soon become damaged and start to break up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): School Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bathroad carpark taken over by electric vehicle charging stations?, 10th February
item.description:
"the average cost to buy an electric car in the UK is around £46,000," "Average Income in Gloucestershire The average annual salary in Gloucestershire is £35,631 , and the median salary is £34,400." How can the council justify this giant proportion of carpark spaces for the 1 or 2 % of the population of Gloucester County who can purchase these vehicles? When the potholes on nearly every road are to the point of vehicle-damaging?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Sandford Mill Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
